long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🎨✨ Canva PowerTools 🎨✨

🚀 Boost your Canva experience with Canva PowerTools!

⭐ Features ⭐
🔹 Export Selection as New File 
Easily export any selected objects in your Canva design into a new file. Simply select the objects, right-click, and choose "Export Selection as New File." A perfectly sized new file is created automatically—just paste it with CTRL + V. 📂➡️📋

🔧 Planned Features 🔧
🔹Resize Canvas: Easily shrink or extend the page canvas without scaling the content. 🔄📏
🔹Rulers and Measurements: Define rulers and inspect the sizes of individual objects used in your design. 📐🔍

❤️ Support & Feedback ❤️
Support me via buymeacoffee.com/martinbojnansky ☕ and suggest more features! Your feedback helps make Canva PowerTools even better. Let’s build the ultimate Canva toolkit together! 🛠️💡
